description:
Kaiba is helpless against Pegasus’s Toon World deck and mind-reading abilities.  As the duel ends, Pegasus imprisons Kaiba’s soul into a card, just like Grandpa and Mokuba!  Yugi has had enough!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kaiba Chiru! Muteki no Toon World
Le champion contre le créateur - 2e partie
海馬散る! 無敵のトゥーンワールド
